mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltOrdGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_SN , CNSLT_ORD_GOD_TURN , GOD_NM , ORD_GOD_SECT_CD , GOD_NO , ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_ORD_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNSLT_ORD_GOD_TURN = #{cnsltOrdGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
